comparisonSection.alibaba: One of the world's largest B2B platforms, but the competition is so high that small and medium enterprises struggle to gain an advantage. Additionally, the high costs make evaluating ROI difficult.
comparisonSection.yellow: Easy to use, but limited in language optimization and negotiation support capabilities. Due to the platform's nature, receiving spam emails is also unavoidable.
comparisonSection.globy: Easy to use, but limited in language optimization and negotiation support capabilities. Due to the platform's nature, receiving spam emails is also unavoidable.
comparisonSection.shopify: The best solution for building online stores, but lacks hinges and doesn't fully support B2B activities.
comparisonSection.gmajor: The difference lies in providing a fast and efficient connection system between Vietnamese businesses and international partners, especially focusing on key markets: Japan, USA, and China.

faq1.question: Do I need to pay to register an account?
faq1.answer: No. Users do not need to pay for creating an account or posting products/services.

faq2.question: Are there any difficulties if I cannot communicate in Japanese or English?
faq2.answer: No. The automatic translation system helps communicate smoothly in Japanese, English, and Vietnamese.

faq3.question: What types of companies are registered?
faq3.answer: Mainly manufacturers, food companies, and trading companies from Japan, as well as buyers from the US and China.

faq4.question: Do foreign requests come immediately?
faq4.answer: It depends on your industry and products, but suitable requests can come very quickly.

faq5.question: Do you support negotiations?
faq5.answer: Yes, optional support services by local experts are always available.

content.line1: Connect with global businesses without attending international trade fairs.
content.line2: Overcome language barriers and introduce your products/services.

featuresCarousel.solution: Bringing international market expansion solutions for Vietnamese businesses

globalConnection.title: Direct connection with global businesses
globalConnection.desc: Direct connection with global businesses: A series of suppliers, manufacturers and potential partners from Japan, USA, China, Vietnam... are ready. This is the gateway that helps Vietnamese businesses get closer to international markets.

translation.title: Automatic multilingual translation system
translation.desc: Automatic multilingual translation system: You can message comfortably in Vietnamese, the system will instantly convert to English or Japanese, ensuring conversations are always seamless and effective.

negotiation.title: Connect to move towards real negotiations
negotiation.desc: Connect to move towards real negotiations: GMAJOR is not just a place to introduce products. With practical features, this platform helps you shorten the distance from introduction to negotiation and contract signing.

freePosting.title: Free product/service posting
freePosting.desc: Free product/service posting, no risk involved: Just post your products or services, and you'll have the opportunity to receive collaboration requests from around the world.

aiOptimization.title: AI-optimized product descriptions
aiOptimization.desc: AI-optimized product descriptions: No deep expertise needed, with just a few keywords, AI will help you create professional product description content, standardized for international markets.

pricing.title: Free basic features – Reasonable upgrade packages
pricing.desc: Free basic features - reasonable upgrade packages: Exclusively for SMEs, GMAJOR provides all basic features completely free. If you need upgrades, you can choose paid packages with suitable costs, especially for businesses with limited budgets.

infoSection.intro1: In recent years, the ambition of SMEs to reach international markets has been growing stronger.
infoSection.intro2: However, reality presents many barriers that are not easy to overcome

language.title: LANGUAGE
language.description: When lacking English or Japanese skills, businesses easily miss opportunities in email exchanges or negotiations.

information.title: INFORMATION
information.description: Online searches yield too many results, making it difficult to assess the credibility of factories or partners.

access.title: ACCESS
access.description: Dependence on trade fairs or intermediaries increases costs and lacks initiative.

manpower.title: MANPOWER
manpower.description: From international personnel teams, foreign market research, communication skill improvement, budget approval... all require time and cost to build.

budget.title: BUDGET
budget.description: Even when businesses want to expand globally, budget constraints often prevent plans from being approved.

start.title: START
start.description: Large platforms like Alibaba are both expensive and difficult to clearly determine return on investment (ROI).

comment1.label: More Smoothly
comment1.quote: I received direct inquiries from Japanese food wholesale companies. With the translation feature, I can communicate with confidence.

comment2.label: Faster
comment2.quote: After 6 months on Alibaba with little response, I registered with GMAJOR and got contacted by a Japanese trading company within 2 months.

comment3.label: Easier
comment3.quote: I wanted to sell coffee to overseas markets but struggled to find buyers. Through GMAJOR, I was able to contract directly with a US buyer.
